kenyawa pasugiya wasara kihipaye di deshapalana arbuda rasakata muhuna dun athara eya krikat kridawata da balapam athi kele ya. 2003 di loka kusalana tharagawaliye awasan purwa wataya dakwa pamini kenyanu kridakayan pasugiya wasara kihipaye di tharamak pasubamakata lakwa sitiye ya. 2003 di tharaga kala stiw tikalo kolins obuya, thomas odayo ha pitar ongondo mewara da sitina athdakim bahula kridakayan we.kenyanu krikat nayaka jim kamande pawasanne shri lankawata erehi ada tharagaye di kridakayan ekolahama eka ha samanawa daskam dakwiya yuthu bawaya.
